content.rendered:
Creator Marie Jardillier

Directed by Marie Jardillier

Written by Marie Jardillier. Estelle Koening. Joël Nsita

Cast Manon Azem( Manon6 episodes, 2022 ). Tiphaine Daviot( Léa6 episodes, 2022 ). Charlotte de Turckheim( Mireille6 episodes, 2022 ). Héléna Noguerra( Patricia6 episodes, 2022 ). Zinedine Soualem( Philippe6 episodes, 2022 ). Oussama Kheddam( Gagan6 episodes, 2022 ). Laurent Bateau(6 episodes, 2022 ). Paul Muguruza(6 episodes, 2022 ). Thierry Perkins-Lyautey( M. Blanchard4 episodes, 2022 ). Magali Lange( Mélanie3 episodes, 2022 ). Gary Mihaileanu( Organisateur concours lapins1 episode, 2022 ). William Sciortino( Skin1 episode, 2022)

Language French

Producers Lisa Leboff

Certificate 15+

Official site Netflix

Season 1

Episodes 6
